title: Land Use Committee Public Hearing 9/13/23

Agenda: Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; CB 120631: relating to land use and zoning - increasing flexibility for lodging uses; CB 120632: relating to land use and zoning - amending the Official Land Use Map; CB 120622: relating to vacant building monitoring and nuisance abatement; Res 32097: endorsing strategies to improve the movement of people and goods in Seattle’s industrial and maritime areas; CB 120635: amending the Seattle Comprehensive Plan to incorporate changes related to a transportation impact fee program.
